data.title: Flooding in Barangay San Antonio
data.description: Heavy rainfall has caused flooding in several areas of Barangay San Antonio. Water level is rising and residents need immediate assistance.

data.title: Fire in Residential Area
data.description: Fire reported in a residential building. Fire department is responding but additional support may be needed.

data.title: Power Outage in Downtown Area
data.description: Widespread power outage affecting downtown area. Estimated restoration time is 2-3 hours.
